projects.title: Telecom Revenue Optimization (Megaline)
projects.description: Conducted statistical hypothesis testing to compare revenue streams between prepaid plans. Performed comprehensive data cleaning and merged multiple datasets to provide evidence-based recommendations for advertising budget allocation.

projects.title: Video Game Market Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed historical sales data to identify patterns determining game success. Modeled platform lifecycles and user profiles by region to guide marketing strategies and spot potential big-hitters for the upcoming year.

projects.title: Instacart Shopping Behavior Analysis
projects.description: Performed rigorous data preprocessing on raw transactional data to resolve missing values and duplicates. Analyzed purchasing habits to uncover peak order times and department preferences, ensuring data accuracy for downstream insights.

projects.title: Music Streaming Preferences
projects.description: Tested hypotheses regarding user listening behavior across different cities (Springfield vs. Shelbyville). Cleaned and compared datasets to validate assumptions about activity during peak business hours.

projects.title: Churn Prediction System (Interconnect)
projects.description: Engineered a robust machine learning pipeline using XGBoost to predict user turnover, enabling the marketing team to identify at-risk customers with high precision and reduce contract cancellations.

projects.title: Bank Customer Retention (BetaBank)
projects.description: Analyzed banking behavior to predict churn risks. Addressed data quality issues by handling class imbalance with SMOTE and upsampling. Achieved high predictive accuracy (F1-score) to support customer retention programs.

projects.title: Oil Well Profit & Risk Analysis (OilyGiant)
projects.description: Developed a linear regression model to predict the volume of oil reserves in new wells. Implemented Bootstrapping techniques to analyze profit distribution and calculate the risk of loss, identifying the most profitable region for development.

projects.title: Foundations of Machine Learning
projects.description: Implemented core machine learning algorithms from scratch to understand their mathematical underpinnings. Demonstrated strong aptitude in logic and math by applying various classification and regression techniques to standard datasets.

projects.title: Interactive Sales Dashboard (Streamlit)
projects.description: Designed and deployed a web-based data dashboard using Streamlit and Plotly Express. Allows stakeholders to visualize car sales trends interactively, fulfilling business needs for accessible, real-time data presentation.

projects.title: Automated Reporting System (Django)
projects.description: Built a scalable solution to generate and distribute PDF reports automatically using Python and Django. Optimized operational costs by 30% and improved data availability for internal business units.

projects.title: SQL Data Integrity & Migration
projects.description: Streamlined database population by developing automatic insertion scripts to reduce manual data entry. Executed complex SQL queries and managed migrations ensuring 100% data integrity during platform transitions.
